effect.text: You may add 1 [C] to any Location. Then, rescue 1 [C] from this Location.
effect.locText: Puedes añadir un [C] a cualquier Lugar. Entonces, rescata a un [C] de este Lugar.

effect.text: Reveal the top card of the Master Plan deck. You may place it on the bottom.
effect.locText: Descubre la carta superior del mazo de Plan Maestro. Puedes colocarla en la parte inferior del mazo.
Puedes obtener una ficha de Ataque.
Puedes obtener una ficha de Mover.

effect.text: If you have 1 or 2 cards in your hand, you may draw 1 card.
effect.locText: Si tienes 1 ó 2 cartas en tu mano, puedes robar una carta.
Puedes obtener una ficha de acción Heroica.

description.text:
SETUP: Choose either the regular Takeover, or the harder Brutal Takeover, placing the card on the table with that side faceup.
If [Civilian] / [Thug] tokens can't be added to a Location, after resolving Overflow, place the excess tokens on the Takeover card. If the card is full, Heroes immediately lose.
description.locText:
SETUP: Choose either the regular Takeover, or the harder Brutal Takeover, placing the card on the table with that side faceup.
If [Civilian] / [Thug] tokens can't be added to a Location, after resolving Overflow, place the excess tokens on the Takeover card. If the card is full, Heroes immediately lose.

bio.text: lt's Spider-Man... as a cartoon pig! Spider-Ham, aka 'Peter' Porker, is a sweet well-intentioned member of the Spider Family. He is always the first one to try and pay a compliment or crack a joke, but despite behaving like the ultimate ham, he takes his job as Spider-Man just as seriously and fights alongside the others with his own special kind of cartoon fury.
bio.locText: Es Spider-Man... ¡como un cerdo de dibujos animados! Spider-Ham, también conocido como 'Peter' Porker, es un miembro dulce y bien intencionado de la familia Spider. Siempre es el primero en tratar de hacer un cumplido o hacer una broma, pero a pesar de comportarse como el mejor aficionado, se toma su trabajo como Spider-Man con la misma seriedad y pelea junto a los demás con su propio tipo especial de furia de dibujos animados.

description.text: Until the beginning of your next turn you cannot be forced to discard your last card.
If you end your turn in the Villain's Location, negate the next Villain movement.
ATTACK in any Location.

bio.text: Hailing from an alternate world in which Peter Parker sacrificed his life to protect the city, Miles Morales inherited the mantle (and powers) of Spider-Man when he was similarly bitten by a genetically altered spider. Though his predecessor's tragic departure left a pair of heroically large shoes to fill, Morales is up to the task, knowing that with great power there must also come great responsibility.
bio.locText: Proveniente de un mundo alternativo en el que Peter Parker sacrificó su vida para proteger la ciudad, Miles Morales heredó el manto (y los poderes) de Spider-Man cuando fue mordido de manera similar por una araña genéticamente alterada. Aunque la trágica partida de su predecesor dejó un par de zapatos heroicamente grandes por llenar, Morales está a la altura de la tarea, sabiendo que un gran poder también conlleva una gran responsabilidad.

description.text: You cannot take any damage until the beginning of your next turn.
ATTACK ATTACK against a single enemy in your Location.
If you are in the same Location as the Villain, delay the next Villain Turn by one card.

bio.text: ln an alternate universe, a twist of fate caused Midtown High student Gwen Stacy to receive the bite of a radioactive spider instead of Peter Parker, granting her amazing arachnid-like abilities. Taking on the name Ghost-Spider, Stacy donned a unique costume and endeavored to exploit her newfound talents for personal gain and attention. However, when Parker died in a tragic lab experiment gone wrong, Stacy learned that with great power there must also come great responsibility. Now she uses her powers to protect the innocent. balancing her life as Ghost-Spider with the challenges of teenage life.
bio.locText: En un universo alternativo, un giro del destino hizo que la estudiante de Midtown High, Gwen Stacy, recibiera la mordedura de una araña radiactiva en lugar de Peter Parker, lo que le otorgó sus increíbles habilidades similares a las de los arácnidos. Tomando el nombre de Ghost-Spider, Stacy se puso un traje único y se esforzó por explotar sus nuevos talentos para obtener atención y beneficio personal. Sin embargo, cuando Parker murió en un trágico experimento de laboratorio que salió mal, Stacy aprendió que un gran poder también conlleva una gran responsabilidad. Ahora usa sus poderes para proteger a los inocentes. equilibrando su vida como Ghost-Spider con los desafíos de la vida adolescente.

description.text: You cannot take any damage until the beginning of your next turn.
Swap two Threat cards in play.
Defeat all THUG in your Location.

bio.text: Once a shy science nerd, Peter Parker's life was changed forever when a bite by a radioactive spider granted him amazing arachnid-like abilities. After the tragic death of his beloved Uncle Ben, Peter realized that with great power, there must also come great responsibility. He has since devoted his life to protecting New York City and its citizens as the Amazing Spider-Man!
bio.locText: La vida de Peter Parker, un tímido nerd de la ciencia, cambió para siempre cuando una picadura de una araña radiactiva le otorgó increíbles habilidades similares a las de los arácnidos. Después de la trágica muerte de su amado tío Ben, Peter se dio cuenta de que un gran poder conlleva una gran responsabilidad. Desde entonces ha dedicado su vida a proteger la ciudad de Nueva York y sus ciudadanos como ¡el asombroso Hombre Araña!

description.text: Gain 2 MOVE tokens.
ATTACK ATTACK ATTACK. For each THUG defeated with this Special Effect, gain 1 HEROIC token.
Rescue up to 3 CIVILIAN in you Location. For each CIVILIAN rescued with this Special Effect, gain 1 ATTACK token.

bio.text: A powerful businessman and industrialist, Norman Osborn gained superhuman abilities during a lab accident in which he was testing an experimental serum. Left mentally deranged as a side effect at the transformation, Osborn set about to wreak havoc on the streets of New York as the costumed criminal known as the Green Goblin. Despite his recurring maniacal efforts to sow chaos throughout the city, the Goblin is kept at bay by the heroic efforts of his long time arch-nemesis, the Amazing Spider-Man.
bio.locText: Un poderoso empresario e industrial, Norman Osborn adquirió habilidades sobrehumanas durante un accidente de laboratorio en el que estaba probando un suero experimental. Dejado mentalmente trastornado como efecto secundario de la transformación, Osborn se dispuso a causar estragos en las calles de Nueva York como el criminal disfrazado conocido como el Duende Verde. A pesar de sus maníacos esfuerzos recurrentes para sembrar el caos en toda la ciudad, el Goblin se mantiene a raya gracias a los heroicos esfuerzos de su archienemigo de mucho tiempo, el Amazing Spider-Man.

description.text: As long as this card is faceup in the Storyline, Green Goblin has 1 extra HEALTH and deals 1 extra damage with his BAM!.
As long as this card is faceup in the Storyline, Green Goblin has 1 extra HEALTH and deals 1 extra damage with his BAM!.
If there are any CIVILIAN in Green Goblin's Location, take 1 and place it on his dashboard.
If there are any CIVILIAN in Green Goblin's Location, take 1 and place it on his dashboard.
BAM! Deal 1 damage to each Hero in both adjacent Locations.
BAM! Move this Threat to the next clockwise Location with any Heroes and no Threat (if possible). Deal 1 damage to each Hero in that Location.
BAM! Deal 2 damage among Heroes in this Location (Heroes choose how to split the damage).
When this Threat is placed, add THUG to this Location. Each THUG in this Location requires 2 damage to be defeated.
When this Threat is placed, add THUG to this Location. Each THUG in this Location requires 2 damage to be defeated.
Green Goblin cannot take any damage as long as there are any CIVILIAN in this Location.

specialSetup.text: Do not place the Threat cards and tokens on the Locations. Keep the cards in a facedown Threat deck and the tokens in a side pool.

specialRules.text: When a Threat is cleared, shuffle it in the deck and add a Threat token from the pool to the Mission. Green Goblin can't be damaged if there are any CIVILIAN here. If you are in his Location, you can use HEROIC HEROIC to rescue a CIVILIAN here.

overflow.text: If 1 or more CIVILIAN/THUG tokens can't be added to a Location, draw a Threat card and place it in the next clockwise Location wothout a Threat.

bam.text: Deal 1 damage to each Hero in Green Goblin's Location. Draw a Threat card and place it in the next clockwise Location without a Threat.

plot.text: The Heroes lose when all Locations have a Threat card.
